1028530.name: Paper Memories - Comics from Finding Paradise & To the Moon
1028530.description:
Over 50 pages of comic of stories from Finding Paradise and To the Moon, including:


  • Comic featuring Johnny & River from To the Moon
  • Comic featuring Colin, Faye, & Sofia from Finding Paradise
  • Comic featuring Colin & River from Finding Paradise & To the Moon
  • Various misc. snippets of the SigCorp Doctors
  • Bonus music tracks based on themes from Finding Paradise & To the Moon

(This DLC will be downloaded to Finding Paradise's Steam folder. To navigate there, right click Finding Paradise from Steam library -> Property -> Local Files -> Open Local Folder. [*There's currently an issue where the files may download to To the Moon's folder instead. Fixing soon!])
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Illustrated by puré
Story by Kan Gao & puré

Physical collector's edition pre-order:

(Rebate available for those who purchased the DLC; instructions within.)

*The main comics in this collection will be made public in the coming weeks; this DLC is for those who'd like to support the project's creation. d-(' ' d-)
*This is the same package as its To the Moon counterpart.
1028530.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 简体中文
